title: Judiciary
context: §601-1 Judiciary. There shall be a branch of government, styled the judiciary. [L 1892, c 57, §1; RL 1925, §2211; RL 1935, §3570; RL 1945, §9571; RL 1955, §213-1; am L 1959, c 259, §1(a); HRS §601-1; am L 1974, c 159, §14] Cross References Judicial power vested in supreme court and circuit courts, and in inferior courts established by legislature, see Const. art. VI, §1.
